intro: Nitrosalsola delileana, commonly known as the Delile's nitrosalsola, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, which is commonly known as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its succulent leaves and small, star-shaped flowers that bloom in shades of yellow and white. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, often found in rocky soils. Due to its unique adaptations, it is considered a valuable species for ecological studies in desert ecosystems.
